 java.lang.String obtainLoopbackIp4Address()

getIp4NonLoopbackAddressOfThisMachine

public INetAddress getIp4NonLoopbackAddressOfThisMachine()
Returns a non-loopback ip4 hostname of the local host.

Returns:
A string hostName

obtainLoopbackIp4Address

public java.lang.String obtainLoopbackIp4Address()
Returns a single address that is guaranteed to resolve to an ipv4 representation of localhost This may either be a hostname or an ip address, dependending if we can guarantee what that the hostname will resolve to ip4.

Returns:
The address part og such an address
